name: tweendeck
title: TweenDeck
description: Next level animated slide decks, powered by Greensock

scripts.build: node-sass css/sass/base.scss css/stylesheets/base.css --output-style expanded && node-sass css/sass/utilities.scss css/stylesheets/utilities.css --output-style compact && node-sass css/sass/components.scss css/stylesheets/components.css --output-style expanded && node-sass css/sass/style.scss css/style.min.css --output-style compressed --source-map true
